mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM "wrNo", WR_TITLE "WRTITLE", WR_CONTENT "WRCONTENT", TO_CHAR(WR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "WRDATE", PI_NICKNAME "WRPERSON" FROM WEEKLYREPVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "MEETANALCOUNT" FROM GROUPOUTPUTVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ASS_OU_CODE = 'OU_1'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "MEETDESIGNCOUNT" FROM GROUPOUTPUTVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ASS_OU_CODE = 'OU_2'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "MEETAVARTARCOUNT" FROM GROUPOUTPUTVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ASS_OU_CODE = 'OU_3'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "MEETTESTCOUNT" FROM GROUPOUTPUTVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ASS_OU_CODE = 'OU_4'

SELECT SUM(COUNT(*)) AS "MEETCOUNT" FROM GROUPOUTPUTVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ASS_OU_CODE IN ('OU_1', 'OU_2', 'OU_3', 'OU_4') AND ASS_OU_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ASS_OU_CODE

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "PLANCOUNT" FROM GROUPOUTPUTVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ASS_OU_CODE = 'OU_1'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "REQUESTCOUNT" FROM GROUPOUTPUTVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ASS_OU_CODE = 'OU_2'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "FLOWCHARTCOUNT" FROM GROUPOUTPUTVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND ASS_OU_CODE = 'OU_3'

SELECT PI_NICKNAME "PINICKNAME" FROM GROUPSETVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND JOB_CODE = 'JOB_1'

SELECT PI_NICKNAME "PINICKNAME" FROM GROUPSETVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND JOB_CODE = 'JOB_2'

SELECT PI_NICKNAME "PINICKNAME" FROM GROUPSETVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND JOB_CODE = 'JOB_3'

SELECT PI_NICKNAME "PINICKNAME" FROM GROUPSETVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND JOB_CODE = 'JOB_4'

SELECT "START", END "END" FROM PROJECT_INFO WHERE CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE)

SELECT ROUND((ADJUSTED_DATE/DAY_OP)*100,1) AS "PERCENT" FROM GROUPPERIODVIEW WHERE CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND SD_SS_CODE = 'SS_1'

SELECT ROUND((ADJUSTED_DATE/DAY_OP)*100,1) AS "PERCENT" FROM GROUPPERIODVIEW WHERE CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND SD_SS_CODE = 'SS_2'

SELECT ROUND((ADJUSTED_DATE/DAY_OP)*100,1) AS "PERCENT" FROM GROUPPERIODVIEW WHERE CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND SD_SS_CODE = 'SS_3'

SELECT ROUND((ADJUSTED_DATE/DAY_OP)*100,1) AS "PERCENT" FROM GROUPPERIODVIEW WHERE CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND SD_SS_CODE = 'SS_4'
SELECT PC_CODE "PCCODE" FROM GROUPTEAMVIEW WHERE MEM_CODE = #{memCode }
SELECT PC_CODE "PCCODE" FROM GROUPTEAMVIEW WHERE MEM_CODE = #{leaderMemCode}

SELECT DISTINCT OP_MEM_CODE FROM OPEN_PROJECT OP LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON TJ.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON PA.PA_MEM_CODE = OP.OP_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PC.PC_PA_NO = PA.PA_NO WHERE OP_CODE = #{opCode}

SELECT LC_PC_CODE FROM ( SELECT LC_PC_CODE, PA_MEM_CODE, LC_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LC_DATE DESC) AS row_num FROM LEADER_CHANGE LC LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON LC.LC_PC_CODE = PC.PC_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = TJ.TJ_NO WHERE TJ_OP_CODE = #{opCode} ) WHERE row_num = 1

SELECT PA_MEM_CODE FROM ( SELECT PA_MEM_CODE, LC_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LC_DATE DESC) AS row_num FROM LEADER_CHANGE LC LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON LC.LC_PC_CODE = PC.PC_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = TJ.TJ_NO WHERE TJ_OP_CODE = #{opCode} ) WHERE row_num = 1

SELECT PI_NICKNAME "PINICKNAME" FROM GROUPTEAMVIEW WHERE MEM_CODE = (SELECT OP_MEM_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE)

SELECT PI_NICKNAME "PINICKNAME" FROM GROUPSETUPVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE LEFT JOIN LEAVE LE ON PC.PC_CODE = LE.LEA_PC_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND LEAPCCODE = '이탈자'

SELECT PI_NICKNAME FROM LEADER_CHANGE LC LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON LC.LC_PC_CODE = PC.PC_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = TJ.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON TJ.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON OP.OP_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PERSONAL_INFO PI ON M.MEM_CODE = PI.PI_MEM_CODE WHERE TJ_OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE LEFT JOIN LEAVE LE ON PC.PC_CODE = LE.LEA_PC_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = 'MEM_10' AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE AND LEA_NO IS NOT NULL)
SELECT DISTINCT(QUE_NAME) "QUENAME" FROM EVALNAMEVIEW WHERE QI_CODE = 'QI_2'
SELECT DISTINCT(QUE_NAME) "QUENAME" FROM EVALNAMEVIEW WHERE QI_CODE = 'QI_1'

SELECT PI_NICKNAME "PINICKNAME" FROM TEAMLEADERVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE) AND PA_MEM_CODE = OP_MEM_CODE

SELECT PC_CODE "PCCODE", PI_NICKNAME "PINICKNAME" FROM GROUPSETVIEW WHERE OP_CODE = (SELECT OP_CODE FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB JV ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = JV.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON JV.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE PA_MEM_CODE = #{memCode } AND OP_END_DATE > SYSDATE)
